ing.item: BY 24-INCH SHEET PAN TEMPERATURE: 375 F. OVEN

directions.step:
1. PLACE FISH IN WELL GREASED PANS.
2. BRUSH FISH WITH MELTED BUTTER OR MARGARINE; SPRINKLE WITH PAPRIKA.
3. BAKE 35 MINUTES OR UNTIL LIGHTLY BROWNED.
NOTE: 1. IN STEP 1, PORTIONS SHOULD NOT TOUCH EACH OTHER WHILE BAKING.
NOTE: 2. IN STEP 1, DO NOT THAW FISH PORTIONS BEFORE BAKING.
NOTE: 3. OTHER SIZES AND TYPES OF PANS MAY BE USED. SEE RECIPE NO. A02500.
Recipe Number: L12400
SERVING SIZE: 4 OZ
From the <Army Master Recipe Index File> (actually used today!). Downloaded from Glen's MM Recipe Archive, http://www.erols.com/hosey.
